Partially rolled out; some legacy secrets remain.

technology_stack.auth_identity: OAuth2 for API clients; Okta SSO (partial)
technology_stack.ci_cd: GitHub Actions -> Helm releases to EKS

security_posture.access_control: Okta SSO in use, but several service/admin accounts bypass SSO; MFA inconsistently applied.
security_posture.secrets_management: Vault exists but some legacy services have embedded secrets in Kubernetes/Helm charts.
security_posture.public_attack_surface: Complex webhook flows; potential input validation and rate-limiting issues.
security_posture.third_party_risk: Heavy reliance on KYC and payment gateway partners; weak webhook verification risk.
security_posture.logging_and_detection: Basic infra alerting; no robust behavioral detection for anomalous API usage.
security_posture.devops_practices: Direct merges to main for some teams; limited pre-prod testing for edge cases.

high_value_objectives: Poison fraud model or suppress detection
privilege_escalation_persistence: Compromise GitHub to change CI/CD workflows
Retrieve Vault tokens from developer laptops
lateral_movement: Use compromised service account to access Kafka or Lambda functions that process payouts
